experiences.title: Motion Designer and Music Editor
experiences.subtitle: TMM-Ukraine, advertising agency
workDescription: Produced promotional and image-building animated videos for global brands, achieving high client satisfaction and a 4-year partnership with Shell, resulting in numerous repeat video projects.
Curated music databases and programmed Powergold playlists, elevating in-store ambience across diverse genres, meeting radio industry standards and significantly enhancing customer experience.

Led and expanded the department, hiring 3 new team members to handle a growing client base. Achieved 500% increase in project efficiency through enhanced workflow coordination, training, and effective team management.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.subtitle: SKY Travel Agency
workDescription: Designed and sold 15+ individual tours, ensuring positive customer experiences, repeat business, and referrals.
Created compelling visual content and grew the Instagram profile from zero to 2,000 followers in three months.
Delivered 24/7 customer support with excellent satisfaction, swiftly resolving client issues.
Managed flights, transfers, and efficiently addressed travel disruptions, including cancellations and delays.
